articles.title: Manchester bombing survivor who broke both legs says it's made her a 'better person' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Freya Lewis, 19, from Cheshire, who was severely injured during the Manchester bombing in 2017, told Lorraine she  will mark the fifth anniversary by taking part in a 10K run.
